raw_comment:
What do you notice? There are a lot more colored players than there are coaches.
 
 
 
What do you wonder? I wonder why there is such a big difference between players and coaches.
 
 
 
What impact does this have on you and your community? This has a big impact because so many black people have a dream but too afraid of what might and might not happen.
 
 
 
 
What’s going on in this graph? Write a catchy headline that captures the graph’s main idea. “Why are there so many colored players than coaches!?”
ace_sentences: The graph shows many colored players.
The number of colored players is greater than the number of coaches.
I wonder why there is a big difference between players and coaches.
This difference has a big impact on me and my community.
Many black people have a dream.
Many black people are afraid of what might happen.
Many black people are afraid of what might not happen.
The headline is: Why are there so many colored players than coaches!?
